name: 24me
tag_list: productivity, task, personal-assistant, chores, errands, gtd, bills, birthdays, gifts, taskrabbit, helper
overview:
24me is the Next Generation Personal Assistant, which pulls information from the user’s real life to provide pertinent data before the user knows they need it, and enables completion of daily chores with one tap.

24me can automatically notify users about their financials, service providers, friends’ special events, and other errands. 24me can also take care of things for users. It can pay bills, send gifts for birthdays and even find professionals to run errands for the users. All the above automation is achieved by connecting the users’ real life into 24me. 24me connects to thousands of banks and financial institutions in the U.S such as Bank Of America, Chase, Citibank and more. It connects to hundreds of service provides such as AT&T, Verizon wireless, and Cablevision. By typing a task, 24me also helps users find someone to run that task for them. 24me integrates with your smartphone’s contacts end enables a better way of calling/texting/emailing without forgetting a thing.
The current product which is available on the AppStore offers a full package of task management tool that allow adding different tasks, speech-to-text and Siri enabled, setting priorities, sharing tasks with family and friends, setting reminders, tagging tasks and more unique features. 24me is available for free on the AppStore: https://itunes.apple.com/app/24me/id557745942?mt=8

video_embeds.embed_code: Introducing 24me from 24me on Vimeo.
